1.ar: باب كَيْفَ كَانَ بَدْءُ الْوَحْىِ إِلَى رَسُولِ اللَّهِ صلى الله عليه وسلم
1.en: How the Divine Revelation started being revealed to Allah's Messenger

3.ar: باب مَنْ سُئِلَ عِلْمًا وَهُوَ مُشْتَغِلٌ فِي حَدِيثِهِ فَأَتَمَّ الْحَدِيثَ ثُمَّ أَجَابَ السَّائِلَ
3.en: Whoever is asked about knowledge while he is busy in some conversation, so he finished talking and then answered the questioner

4.ar: باب لاَ تُقْبَلُ صَلاَةٌ بِغَيْرِ طُهُورٍ
4.en: CHAPTER. No Salat (prayer) is accepted without ablution (i.e, to remove, the  small Hadith by ablution or the big Hadith by taking a bath)

5.en: The performance of ablution before taking a bath

6.en: Menses (a thing) ordained (by Allah and instructions) for women when they get their menses

8.ar: باب كَيْفَ فُرِضَتِ الصَّلاَةُ فِي الإِسْرَاءِ
8.en: How As-Salat (the Prayer) was prescribed on the night of Al-Isra (miraculous night journey) of the Prophet (pbuh) to Jerusalem (and then to the heavens)

9.en: The times of As-Salat (the prayers) and the superiority of offering Salat (prayers) in time

10.en: How the Adhan for Salat (Prayer) was started

11.en: The prescription of Jumu'ah prayer and Khutba

13.en: The two Eid and sprucing oneself up on them

14.en: What is said regarding the Witr prayer

15.ar: باب الاِسْتِسْقَاءِ وَخُرُوجِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم فِي الاِسْتِسْقَاءِ
15.en: Going out of the Prophet (pbuh) to offer Istisqa' prayer

16.en: As-Salat (the prayer) during a solar eclipse

17.ar: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي سُجُودِ الْقُرْآنِ وَسُنَّتِهَا
17.en: Prostrations during the recitation of the Qur'an

18.ar: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي التَّقْصِيرِ وَكَمْ يُقِيمُ حَتَّى يَقْصُرَ
18.en: For what period of stay one should offer shortened prayers

20.ar: باب فَضْلِ الصَّلاَةِ فِي مَسْجِدِ مَكَّةَ وَالْمَدِينَةِ
20.en: The superiority of offering As-Salat in the Mosque of Makkah and Al-Madina

21.ar: باب اسْتِعَانَةِ الْيَدِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ إِذَا كَانَ مِنْ أَمْرِ الصَّلاَةِ
21.en: To take the help of the hands while offering Salat

22.ar: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي السَّهْوِ إِذَا قَامَ مِنْ رَكْعَتَىِ الْفَرِيضَةِ
22.en: What is said regarding the Sahw: If someone gets up (for the third rak'a without sitting) after the second rak'a of a compulsory salat (prayer)

23.ar: باب فِي الْجَنَائِزِ وَمَنْ كَانَ آخِرُ كَلاَمِهِ لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ اللَّهُ
23.en: What is said about funerals, and those whose last words were: La ilãha ilallãh (none has the right to be worshipped but Allah)

25.en: It is obligatory to perform Hajj
